name: top_stories
title: Hacker News Top Stories
description: This recipe will teach you how to retrieve and display trending articles on Hacker News

control_sets.title: Getting Top Stories
control_sets.tip: Use the Firebase API to retrieve the latest trending stories from the API as a JSON array of itemIDs, e.g. [48736, 2986, 10736]

control_sets.title: Getting Story Details
control_sets.tip: Once you have an itemID, use the /item endpoint to get its details

control_sets.title: Displaying the Results
control_sets.tip: Here's one way to present the results.
